overview: Andr√©s has a common and meaningful problem: his right shoe has a huge hole and it seems his toe is about to escape through it. Normally, this wouldn't be such a deal, but the school year-end ball takes place in less than a day and Mariana, the girl he likes, wants to dance with him. Andres has just an afternoon to repair his shoe or find a new pair: if he wants to impress her, he must be dashing.
title: The Dance
